author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: FriendlyElec has released the NanoPi R3S LTS, an updated version of its compact single-board network platform based on the Rockchip RK3566. This revision introduces key hardware changes, including HDMI 2.0 video output, a repositioned USB 3.0 Type-A port, and a more refined peripheral layout, while retaining dual gigabit Ethernet and broad software support. The board […]
title: $25 NanoPi R3S LTS Router Board Adds HDMI and Speaker Support in Updated Design
